chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 13 mini has a problem: My order hasn't been sent. Thank you,

Dear Backcare,

The order is currently being shipped under the tracking number 1ZBF1560D901220729. Here is the tracking link:
https://www.ups.com/track?loc=es_es&requester=QUIC&tracknum=1ZBF1560D901220729/trackdetails

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the parcel has been delivered to the customer on 12th June. If the customer requires no further assistance, kindly close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hi ecomobile,

My name is Claudia, Back Market Agent, and I hope you are having a great day.

Order delivery confirmation message has already been sent and the incident is closed.

All regards,
Claudia, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We take note of your message.

Regards,
JH
